channel.title: Minotaur
channel.description:
Yes, 100% Made by me. (I know the mouth is not 100% done yet).
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/Mfront-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/mside-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/mwire.jpg[/img]
Here it is with a little bit of textures. [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/texturedm.jpg[/img]
Here it is being animated. (TBH - My favorite part of modeling). [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/api.jpg[/img]
I finished animating it! works 100% I do not have my server atm (Redid my computer) But it works in Rs Poser just fine :) Now I know there is going to be some people who think that doing this is impossible, Well it isn't if you try hard you will learn how to do it.
Well and here is my proof, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mGIPYLMby8M

item.title: Minotaur
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“The Arcanian, post:24, topic:342883”][quote author=thunderflea link=topic=439287.msg3231250#msg3231250 date=1276091307]
it just looks abnormal [.img]http://aom.heavengames.com/hg-aom/pix/news/minotaur.jpg[/img]
[/quote]

Make one yourself! Will see if you got the skills dude. Don’t critise too much if you can’t do better![/quote]

a person can criticize however much they want. If a person had to be good at something to criticize it, you wouldnt be able to say what was good about a movie (or something else) without being a director of an award winning movie…

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

The Arcanian:

Make one yourself! Will see if you got the skills dude. Don’t critise too much if you can’t do better!

See, now you have gone off and made yourself look like an idiot. You don’t have to be a great modeler to criticize another persons model. Thats a horrid assumption. If this is the case, why would I ever have posted models here when most of you are unable to model beyond certain level of sword details? Thats like saying that just because I’m at a higher skill level than you, I cannot be criticized by you just because im better than you. Think about it: that means i could post a totally piece of shit model and you would be unable to criticize it just because I myself as a modeler am ‘superior’ (so to speak) than you in modeling. Your statement is totally incorrect. Its that logic that causes many moparscapians to consider themselves amazing at everything, all because of the words 'Don’t criticize if you can’t do better." Everyone and everything needs criticism. I cannot believe I have to state this yet again.

Read full topic

item.description:

Oh I got a good change. Make the torso skin color. Totally didn’t catch that. You don’t have to change it, in my opinion its fine as is, I just looked over some games that have minotaurs in it and they don’t make the torso skin colored. I think it was that picture that made me think of that

item.title: Minotaur
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

thunderflea:

umm, its good modeling. not a good minitaur. make him lean forward more, he has a pole up his ***. and then also make his head bigger

You don’t have to censor yourself. And that is the basic standing pose. What your talking about is when the model is in-game. That will be a standing emote, and the minotaur will be bent over and probably holding a weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:14, topic:342883”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=439287.msg3228334#msg3228334 date=1275799582]

hes got a 6 pack of fried chicken


[/quote]

LOL.
As Frell said, move on baby, this is really good work, I have yet to complete a human based character, I always get stuck at what to do at the arms. :([/quote]
The arms arent all that hard. Just start them out complletely shapeless and then shape them to how you want them.

About the minotaur: Its decent. It could use some reshaping. Also, try and make it more 'JaGeX" style. In otherwords, use multiple material colors and use alot of shading. i.e the legs: Start them out dark and make them lighter as you go up.

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:9, topic:342883”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=439287.msg3228142#msg3228142 date=1275789900]
It’s a cow on it’s hind legs. The only way it is similar to a Minotaur is that it has human hands.

Put in some fur, bigger biceps/abs, an axe (unless you are only going for the animal part), and a better mouth.
[/quote]
Fur is done with textures, and that is kind of a hard concept, not sure if Man killerx can make his own textures, if he can I will take off my hat and salute him. And he said that he’s working on mouth.[/quote]Or a bunch of tiny little cones. (he he)

I know he said that, I was just saying it needed to be worked on.

Read full topic
